title: How to Make Folders on PS3

steps.headline: Press .△ on your file of choice picture/music/video file etc.
Select information on the menu that appears.
Find the text field labeled album type.
steps.description: Enter the name of the album (aka folder) you wish to have that file in, for example 'New Pictures', and then return to the cross-media-bar (main menu).

steps.headline: Adjust the view as needed.
steps.description: If your new albums (aka folders) aren't appearing press □ until the files are sorted by album.

text: Press .△ on your file of choice picture/music/video file etc.  Select information on the menu that appears.  Find the text field labeled album type. Enter the name of the album (aka folder) you wish to have that file in, for example 'New Pictures', and then return to the cross-media-bar (main menu). Adjust the view as needed. If your new albums (aka folders) aren't appearing press □ until the files are sorted by album.
